Articles.Content: Land Ho!!! The HypeTrain is re-entering kerbin's atmosphere, the re-entry heat is lethal, luckily we are still in .90 so it's no big. But Moar Hype!!!! SoonTM!!!!
I was told to come here for hype, can I haz hype plx?

The Dutch have it good today, being Koningsdag and all. I'm home with a cold, so I get to drink soup and play KSP all day! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![F3tOz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/F3tOz.jpg)

HYPE SPEED IS LUDICROUS! LET'S GO FASTER! LUDICROUS IS NOT ENOUGH!
C'mon c'mon c'moooon!!!! (First post on the forum, by the way ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/F3tOz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/F3tOz.jpg)
> HYPE SPEED IS LUDICROUS! LET'S GO FASTER! LUDICROUS IS NOT ENOUGH!

Do you have a death wish or something???

> 
> told you it is not today. Close steam, stop refreshing and go home.

interloper, you will not stop the hype train

> 
> no, that's siesta time
> if we don't get a release before 10AM we won't get it till after 1PM

That means if it isn't out within the next 7 minutes, it won't be out for another three hours! WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO FOR THOSE THREE HOURS??
So after the HYPE train arrives at 1.0 station it becomes Squads PARTY TRAIN for the onward journey right? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You said we need to increase the hype more

![MdslUtj.png](http://i.imgur.com/MdslUtj.png)

You have my KSS Sting
What happened? Did we die? Is the train still in one piece?
10 minutes on kerbalx!

> 
> Do you have a death wish or something???

Nope. Just too much Hype!

I can't contain this hype. I'm just gonna leave for like, fifteen minutes, to refresh my thoughts. Hopefully it'll come out 'till then. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I was told to come here for hype, can I haz hype plx?

You've gotta make your own hype, friend. C'mon, join us!
For !SCIENCE!
Need more hype. Keep feeding the hype train.
So is there a prize for the 5,000th poster in the Mega Hype thread?

> 
> that means if it isn't out within the next 7 minutes, it won't be out for another three hours! What are we going to do for those three hours??

we go for 400 pages

Hype staging active

![YTUG02VsjCWCA.gif](http://i.giphy.com/YTUG02VsjCWCA.gif)
WoW, we've beat the 0.24 hype by a margin!

> 
> What happened? Did we die? Is the train still in one piece?

The train has surpassed the speed of light. We are not sure how physics work now, but the train is definitely there. The train is eternal. And it has no brakes.

While we all patiently wait for 1.0 to come out, enjoy these rare photos from the Gemini missions: [http://thechive.com/2015/04/27/rare-pics-from-inside-nasas-gemini-missions-17-photos/](http://thechive.com/2015/04/27/rare-pics-from-inside-nasas-gemini-missions-17-photos/)

> 
> What happened? Did we die? Is the train still in one piece?

External integrator is at 45% and decreasing. All hype containment devices are overflowing.
